xwikidoc.name: ReviewEmail
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
#set($nl = $xwiki.getNl()) From: $adminemail${nl}To: $email${nl}Subject: Your resource has been reviewed by Planète Sankoré.
Thank you for contributing to Planète Sankoré, and greetings from the Planète Sankoré Review team.
Your contribution, $assettitle, has recently been reviewed and was given a rating of $assetrating.
You can read the full comments from this review by clicking on the following link:
$assetcommentsurl
Remember, you can always modify a resource or collection, then renominate it for a new score.
Thanks again for contributing! Your contributions help the members of the global Planète Sankoré community access high quality content.
--The Planète Sankoré Team
If you do not wish to receive emails like this in the future, you may change your notifications settings at the following link when you are logged in:
$profileurl
